description: This file defines a static class `PasswordHasher` that provides methods for hashing passwords and verifying password hashes using HMACSHA512.

classes.name: PasswordHasher
classes.description: Provides static methods for hashing and verifying passwords with HMACSHA512

methods.name: HashPassword
methods.description: Generates a hash and salt for a given password using HMACSHA512.

methods.name: VerifyPassword
methods.description: Verifies a password against a stored hash and salt using HMACSHA512.
